title: ☪️ shayne_chester_artist
subtitle: It must seem that way, but it's not true. There is a huge underground ants nest of compassion for asylum seekers and refugees. Its just most Australians are more worried about money than human rights. pic.twitter.com/8XatQmutTI

title: David Manne
subtitle: UN Secretary-General @antonioguterres says at Global #RefugeeForum that the UN must be measured by how the world’s most vulnerable are treated. And that ‘how refugees are treated, so goes the world’. @RefugeeLegalpic.twitter.com/tydVXMu81x

title: ECCV
subtitle: Tomorrow is #InternationalMigrantsDay. @UNmigration asks the international community to come together and remember the refugees and migrants who lost their lives or have disappeared while trying to reach safe harbour after arduous journeys: https://www.who.int/life-course/news/events/intl-migrants-day/en/ …pic.twitter.com/klkWxIyQZB

title: Elaine Pearson
subtitle: 'In Nauru, I was called by my boat number, I was called ‘refugee’. I felt like I had that word plastered on my face. Here, the Chicagoans just call me Faisal, and if they don’t know my name, they even call me sir.” https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2019/dec/17/im-happy-but-i-am-also-broken-for-those-left-behind-life-after-manus-and-nauru …pic.twitter.com/pnVO1g3ATv

title: Au Science Media Ctr
subtitle:

title: Oxfam Australia
subtitle: 116 countries are meeting at this week's Global #RefugeeForum to pledge their support for refugees & their host communities. With a record number of refugees worldwide, the time is now: https://oxf.am/36FRahK  #EveryoneCountspic.twitter.com/RCjup35oVf

title: Jordy Silverstein
subtitle:
here's the abstract for my new article in @AJPandH - i'm hoping it can be useful in pointing out the nationalism in 'refugee discourse' in this country & so maybe help provoke a change in language/narrative...

article is at https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/ajph.12618 …. let me know if you want a copypic.twitter.com/LLldVBrtNi

title: Amnesty New Zealand
subtitle: The first Global Refugee Forum will take place in Geneva tomorrow & it comes at the end of a tumultuous decade in which refugee numbers has risen to over 25 million people worldwide  pic.twitter.com/g8UIZGcP5K

title: #SpecFic #Writer
subtitle: #RT @amnestyOz: RT @drgrahamthom: Such an honour to have ⁦@Craig_Foster⁩ launch #GameOver ⁦@amnestyOz⁩ to get those #refugees remaining off #Nauru and #PNG ⁦and to bring them safetypic.twitter.com/ac7y7A5k1N

title: Megan Robinson
subtitle: Christmas presents at church for every refugee child in Auckland who's having their first Christmas in New Zealand. For many it's their first ever Christmas present. @NZRedCross @DrJinRussellpic.twitter.com/G8FMAOaIgv

title: Smoke & Mirrors Smirko
subtitle: The point is that the international media is already reporting it.  The Australian media won’t. The same way they don’t report on dead refugees in indefinite detention. MSM won’t admit to Australia’s rampant racism. pic.twitter.com/YhltW5CBsN – at Southport Yacht Club

title: Dai Le
subtitle: I had the honour to be a #keynote speaker at @highfairfield #presentationday on Friday. Most of the students are migrants or refugee. The school itself has had to take on many of the children from the intakes of 10,000 refugees into our city in the past two years. pic.twitter.com/AhtKWh95sQ

title: Australia for UNHCR
subtitle:
Shakira, Zakia and Aya at the UNHCR registration centre in Bardarash refugee camp in Iraq. They are three of the many children forced to flee northeastern Syria. 

UNHCR is on the ground providing lifesaving physical and psychosocial support  http://www.unrefugees.org.au/helpsyria pic.twitter.com/V499tTSKLZ

title: Blackbaud-Pacific
subtitle:
This holiday season, we hosted a book drive to collect donated books for @theALNF.

These books will go to disadvantaged youth and Indigenous, refugee and marginalised communities in need of resources.

We are so happy to donate over 110 books this year! #blackbaudcarespic.twitter.com/Gl1D97Vspf
